meanings.sent1: The dog's spittiest behavior was when it shook its wet fur all over the room.
meanings.sent2: She always chose the spittiest watermelon at the market.
meanings.sent3: The spittiest cat in the neighborhood loved to play in the sprinklers.
meanings.sent4: The spittiest rainstorm we had ever seen flooded the streets within minutes.
meanings.sent5: The spittiest lemonade had just the right amount of tanginess.

meanings.sent1: The spittiest soup she ever tasted made her cringe.
meanings.sent2: He avoided the spittiest person in the office during flu season.
meanings.sent3: The spittiest fountain in the park was a favorite spot for birds to cool off.
meanings.sent4: The spittiest argument they had ended with laughter and apologies.
meanings.sent5: The spittiest grapefruit had a burst of flavor in every bite.
